nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines the functions to work with Oracle feeds.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: PairAggregatorInterface

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the current answer from the aggregator.
@return the latest answer.
nodes.name: getLatestAnswer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the last updated height from the aggregator.
@return the latest timestamp.
nodes.name: getLatestTimestamp
getPreviousAnswer
getPreviousTimestamp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the latest completed round where the answer was updated.
@return the latest round id.
nodes.name: getLatestRound

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the current Chainlink oracle aggregator used for this pair aggregator instance.
@return the Chainlink oracle aggregator address.
nodes.name: aggregator
initialize
getInfo

nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines the functions to work with Oracle feeds.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: PairAggregatorInterface

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the current answer from the aggregator.
@return the latest answer.
nodes.name: getLatestAnswer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the last updated height from the aggregator.
@return the latest timestamp.
nodes.name: getLatestTimestamp
getPreviousAnswer
getPreviousTimestamp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the latest completed round where the answer was updated.
@return the latest round id.
nodes.name: getLatestRound

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets the current Chainlink oracle aggregator used for this pair aggregator instance.
@return the Chainlink oracle aggregator address.
nodes.name: aggregator
initialize
getInfo

getInfo().return: response decimals.collateral decimals.pending decimals (difference between response and collateral).isInverse true if it is an inverse pair aggregator. Otherwise it returns false.

params.roundsBack: the answer number to retrieve the answer for
the answer number to retrieve the updated timestamp for.

params.aggregatorAddress: to use in this Chainlink pair aggregator.
params.collateralDecimalsValue: the decimals included in the collateral token.
params.isInverse: defines whether this pair aggregator is inverse or not.
params.responseDecimalsValue: the decimals included in the Chainlink response.

aggregator().notice: Gets the current Chainlink oracle aggregator used for this pair aggregator instance.

getInfo().notice: It gets the aggregator info associated to this pair aggregator instance.

getLatestAnswer().notice: Gets the current answer from the aggregator.

getLatestRound().notice: Gets the latest completed round where the answer was updated.

getLatestTimestamp().notice: Gets the last updated height from the aggregator.

getPreviousTimestamp(uint256).notice: Gets block timestamp when an answer was last updated.

initialize(address,bool,uint8,uint8).notice: It creates a new ChainlinkPairAggregator instance.

userdoc.notice: This interface defines the functions to work with Oracle feeds.
